name: Machine Dream (ardakm)
description:
• Take your time to observe the surroundings
  • Find objects to unlock different endings 
  • Leave and come back whenever you want
  • Reflect on your findings and thoughts

The project is about exploring human presence inside the digital space and questioning the affects it might cause overtime related to our mindfulness and understanding of self-presence.

Music and sounds from https://freesound.org/
